name: Pot of The Forbidden
description:
FLIP: You can activate 1 of these effects;
â— Draw 2 cards.
â— Return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the hand.
â— Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
â— Look at your opponent's hand, also shuffle 1 card from their hand into the Deck.
You can only use this effect of "Pot of The Forbidden" once per turn.
